TopicTitle: 0.21 - SSTO - SKRAM Presents a test of ASAS and Struts.

Articles.Content:
http://ksp.sjwt.org/2013-07-25/SSTO.craft

hmmm, a new VAB has been installed..

You say it goes how high??

And its SSTO

I think that about sums this up.

116km x 2032km

A few more photos over at http://www.flickr.com/photos/17805670@N00/9360140631/

SSTO and a half. That is TALL. Bet you someone already doesn't have enough height for something...

Rune. 0.21! Wohoo!

I can live with the available height, for now. The available width is a different matter, hardly room to swing a Ker-Kat!

I hope the fine person responsible for EditorExtensions can make the place a little more roomy.
Ecat what in every hell is that thing?

Ecat what in every hell is that thing?

That is a non-stock version of this http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/22251-Showcase-SPACE-STATIONS!-Post-your-pictures-here?p=531483&viewfull=1#post531483 and looking at it, it certainly would not fit in the new hanger!

I can't really talk about...

No.

Wait...

It's ok they don't know your address, yet.

It's a SSTO space station, fuel depot, inter-planetary explorer, Kethane miner sort of thing. Though you should hear some of the ideas they have had for adding weapons. If you like it when it's finished I'll send you one. I mean that in a friendly way, not in a 'I'll send one to blot out the sun, suck your planet dry and recycle all organics into soylent pink.' Oh, no. They, on the other hand... I think that is exactly what they intend.

Edited July 25, 2013 by ecat

Ecat what in every hell is that thing?

Its obviously a bucket load of Ecats awesome that was just lying around!

Its obviously a bucket load of Ecats awesome that was just lying around!

Says the one who built a rocket so tall it could reach the sky without engines... almost.
